mapper.select: select * from goods inner join brand b on goods.b_id = b.brand_id join category c on c.category_id = goods.c_id where goods.deleted = 0;

select * from goods inner join brand b on goods.b_id = b.brand_id join category c on c.category_id = goods.c_id where goods.deleted = 0 and goods.b_id = (select brand_id from brand where brand_name = #{brandName});

select * from goods inner join brand b on goods.b_id = b.brand_id join category c on c.category_id = goods.c_id where goods.deleted = 0 and goods.c_id = (select category_id from category where category_name = #{categoryName});
mapper.insert: insert into goods(name, price, c_id, b_id, sales, inventory, remarks) values (#{name}, #{price}, #{category.categoryId}, #{brand.brandId}, #{sales}, #{inventory}, #{remarks})
